overview: A compelling supernatural socio-political drama with sci-fi elements about Vincent, a young Black male who is struggling with his ability to communicate with the dead. In a moment of vulnerability, Vincent tells his roommate Monroe in confidence of his gift. Soon it is the talk of the community.  Director  Bobby Huntley(written and directed by)  Stars  Denise ArmstrongRonnie BakerSir Brodie
title: Connect
